name: Fabric Lakehouse Analytics Solution
desc: Built an end-to-end analytics pipeline using Microsoft Fabric, featuring API ingestion, PySpark Lakehouse transformations, and Power BI dashboards

name: Azure Retail Data Platform
desc: Built a cloud-based Azure Data Engineering platform leveraging Medallion Architecture, scalable Spark processing, Delta Lake transformations, and Power BI analytics

name: Enterprise Azure Hybrid Data platform
